system.description:
Streetwise: familiarity with underworld society and the ways of working with it. The Streetwise skill adds to the throw for finding Low Passage passengers (see the Starship Operations chapter for more details).
Examples: throw Streetwise/STR 8+ to intimidate gang members. Throw Streetwise/EDU 6+ to understand criminal slang. Throw Streetwise/INT 8+ to locate a fence or fixer. Throw Streetwise/INT 8+ to shadow someone in an urban environment. Throw Opposed Streetwise/INT to lose a shadow. Throw Streetwise/SOC 10+ to arrange a meet with important criminals.
system.shortdescr: Familiarity with underworld society and the ways of working with it
